Description: Fragment of neck and oval handle to sharp turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-buff; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Aristakos. From same die as Alexandria, Graeco-Roman Museum, MGR 269.10.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (153)
